text: Hey everyone, today we're going to learn the backside 180.
This is one of the most fundamental tricks in snowboarding.
First, you want to make sure you're comfortable riding switch.
Approach the jump with a medium speed, not too fast.
As you hit the lip, start winding up your shoulders.
Pop off the jump and rotate your upper body.
Your lower body will follow naturally.
Spot your landing early, this is crucial.
Land with your knees bent to absorb the impact.
And ride away switch! That's the backside 180.
